data.eml:eml: A new species of Peckoltia from the Upper Orinoco (Siluriformes, Loricariidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Armbruster, Jonathan W., Lujan, Nathan K. (2016): A new species of Peckoltia from the Upper Orinoco (Siluriformes, Loricariidae). ZooKeys 569: 105-121, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.569.6630, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.569.6630
